query:
UPDATE blog_posts SET 
  title = '5 Google Ads Mistakes Home Service Businesses Make (And How to Fix Them)',
  slug = '5-google-ads-mistakes-home-service-businesses',
  content = REPLACE(
    content,
    'Ready to stop wasting ad spend?
Get a free marketing audit and see where your Google Ads account stands — no commitment required.
Get My Free Audit → [blocked]',
    ''
  )
WHERE slug = 'paid-advertising-strategy';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rPebCrXoNSExXo.a36247f6c327 --database bbrAEM5eVgqVKxG9yZnK6V --execute UPDATE blog_posts SET 
  title = '5 Google Ads Mistakes Home Service Businesses Make (And How to Fix Them)',
  slug = '5-google-ads-mistakes-home-service-businesses',
  content = REPLACE(
    content,
    'Ready to stop wasting ad spend?
Get a free marketing audit and see where your Google Ads account stands — no commitment required.
Get My Free Audit → [blocked]',
    ''
  )
